parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Quickness, speed; hastily, immediately. From the same as tachus; a brief space, i.e. in haste.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
